member.name: P:UnityPackageMaker.PackageManifest.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the full name of the package i.e "com.lukeparker.package".

member.name: P:UnityPackageMaker.PackageManifest.DisplayName
member.summary: Gets or sets the display name for the package.

member.name: P:UnityPackageMaker.PackageManifest.Version
member.summary: Gets or sets the package version.

member.name: P:UnityPackageMaker.PackageManifest.Unity
member.summary: Gets or sets the minimum unity version the package supports.

member.name: P:UnityPackageMaker.PackageManifest.Description
member.summary: Gets or sets the package description.

member.name: P:UnityPackageMaker.PackageManifest.Keywords
member.summary: Gets or sets the keywords for the package.

member.name: P:UnityPackageMaker.PackageManifest.Category
member.summary: Gets or sets the category of the package.
